title: Twisted in Texas
description: In this Dateline classic, when one woman breaks off her relationship with a boyfriend she says abused and stalked her, he goes on to something even worse. His accused accomplice? His new girlfriend. Andrea Canning reports. Originally aired on NBC on April 29, 2018.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
